job_tasks.phrase: bouwen en beheren van innovatieve automatiseringsoplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and maintenance of software solutions for automation.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelen van op maat gemaakte automatiseringen
job_tasks.justification: Indicates the creation of custom software to automate processes.

job_tasks.phrase: beheren en verbeteren van bestaande automatiseringen
job_tasks.justification: This implies managing and enhancing already deployed automation solutions, which falls under operations.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses on automation solutions using tools like UiPath, Node-Red, and Power Platform, which are primarily RPA and low-code/no-code platforms. There is no mention of AI models, generative techniques, or core AI engineering responsibilities, making it fall outside the scope of a GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer profile.
